main.slogan: Cause it all started with curiosity

main.desc: Genesis is a non-profit project that aims to increase the availability of education and create fully free comprehensive sources of knowledge. We are guided by the idea that everyone, regardless of their origin and wealth, has the full right to education, and our goal is to provide all people with equal opportunities for a dignified life.

formulas.header: All the knowledge in a nutshell
formulas.desc: The Genesis website offers the most important formulas and tables in subjects such as physics, biology, and math. They are all divided into fields of science and 3 levels of difficulty so that everyone can use them. Learning is also facilitated by captions explaining what pattern we are dealing with and what are the quantities that build it.

books.desc: Ultimately, the Genesis project plans to provide free education to everyone in the world. To this end, free, license-free textbooks translated into as many languages as possible in the world will be created in the future. Currently, academic textbooks are usually expensive, and students are forced to buy dozens of different books on any topic. The task of our project is not only to create free books, but also so comprehensive that they will not need any other books.

statistics.desc: The genesis website also stores all the graph statistics and data that may be of help to everyone. In the distant future, with the support of volunteers, it will also be possible to conduct one's own research.

footer.copyrights: All photos and logos used are copyright-free and made available under the MIT or CC license. It is allowed to use, copy, modify or distribute the original or modified content on this website without restriction, provided that the authorship is acknowledged and the source information is posted.

sciences.philology_middleeast: Middle East, Arabic and Persian Philology

kinematics.name: Kinematics
kinematics.desc: We study the motion of bodies, including their acceleration, path and speed

dynamics.name: Dynamika
dynamics.desc: Zajmiemy się opisem sił działających na różne ciała, a także ich skutkami

energy.name: Energia
energy.desc: Praca moc i energia to wielkości, które pozwolą nam spojrzeć na mechanikę z innej strony, a także będą wstępem do kolejnych działów fizyki.

current.name: Prąd elektryczny
current.desc: Zaczynamy od podstaw, czyli czym jest prąd elektryczny

pick.branch: Wybierz dziedzinę nauki, która cię interesuje

404.header: Nasz system nie znalazł takiej strony :c
404.duck: Więc łap chociaż na pocieszenie kaczkę
404.song: Bit, bit i pusta kartka, drukarka wydaje szmery Nie ma mnie, bo to nocnego marka nocna warta Świeci się tarcza zegarka - 4:04 Nic nie psuje atmosfery, dźwięki smarta czy wiertarka
